pr_title: [KMP] set the Content-Type to `application/json; charset=utf-8` on iOS as well

timeline.message: set the correct Content-Type on iOS

timeline.bodyText: Is this something we can test?
timeline.author: tasomaniac
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -152,6 +152,7 @@ actual class ApolloHttpNetworkTransport(
       val postBody = operation.composeRequestBody(scalarTypeAdapters).toByteArray().toNSData()
       setHTTPMethod("POST")
       headers
+          .plus("Content-Type" to "application/json; charset=utf-8")

replies.bodyText: I must admit I'm a bit lazy to add a test there. The only thing I can think of is to use a mock server and check the headers but that feels like a lot of code for something that most likely won't be changing too much?
replies.author: martinbonnin
